meanings.sent1: Having a map enables you to find your way easily.
meanings.sent2: Studying regularly enables students to understand the material better.
meanings.sent3: Using a calculator enables you to solve math problems without getting a headache.
meanings.sent4: A good night's sleep enables your brain to function at its best.
meanings.sent5: Regular exercise enables your body to stay healthy and strong.

meanings.definition: To give someone the authority or means to do something
meanings.sent1: The manager enables employees to make decisions on their own.
meanings.sent2: Parents enable their children to learn independence by allowing them to make choices.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand enables the wizard to cast powerful spells.
meanings.sent4: The key enables access to the secret room where treasures are hidden.
meanings.sent5: The special code enables entry into the top-secret facility.
